titles.title: You Are God, And We Praise You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are God, and we praise You
You are God; we acclaim You.
You are eternal Father, all creation worships You.
All creation worships You, AMEN.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Eres Dios, y te alabamos.Eres Dios y te aclamamos.Eres eterno padre.Te adora la creación.Te adora la creación, Amén.
